title: P376 KF2 Pendant Lamp Aluminium
body: Originally designed in 1963 by Preben Juhl Fabricius and Jorgen Kastholm, this Mobelaris style of P376 KF2 Pendant Lamp influenced the style of Danish Modernism. Its five symmetrical shades gradually curve towards the center to emit a diffused, non-glaring light. An approach to lamp design that has become an inspiration to other artists' interpretations. This lovely masterpiece is available in aluminium, white, and chrome versions.
